health_percent.description: Health percent we need to go under in order to trip the event.

event_name.description: [string]Event name that gets fired off to the behavior.

reverse_event_name.description: [string]Event name that gets fired off to the behavior when health is increasing instead of decreasing.

event_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play when event is triggered.

reverse_event_sound.description: [wwise]Sound to play when the event is triggered when health is increasing instead of decreasing.
